--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2021/12/24 10:52
--- 判断技能cd
---@class bt_con_cd:ICondition
local bt_con_cd = SimpleClassUtil:class(ICondition)
---@param skillData SkillData
function bt_con_cd:initData(skillData)
    self._skillData = skillData
end
---@param agent Agent
function bt_con_cd:doCondition(blackBoard,agent)
    local result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    if  self._skillData then
        if  self._skillData._skill_time_play then
            local time =  self._skillData._skill_time_play +  self._skillData._skill_time_cd
            result = agent._battleManager._time >= time and Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success or Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
        else
            BattleLog.log(" 技能数据 没有播放时间戳  ",tostring( self._skillData._skillTag))
            result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
        end
    else
        BattleLog.error("黑板没有 技能数据 ",tostring( self._skillData._skillTag))
        result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    end
    return result
end


return bt_con_cd
